Package org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl

Interface LTLRewriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLTLRewriter, EH2000, LTLRewriterAdapter
public interface LTLRewriter
This interface defines rewriters of LTL formulae.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    LTL rewriteAlways​(LTLAlways formula)
    Returns the result of rewriting an always formula.
    LTL rewriteAnd​(LTLAnd formula)
    Returns the result of rewriting a conjunctive formula.
    LTL rewriteAtomic​(LTLAtomic formula)
    Returns the result of rewriting an atomic formula.

    Returns the result of rewriting a back-to formula.
    LTL rewriteBefore​(LTLBefore formula)
    Returns the result of rewriting a before formula.
    LTL rewriteEquivalence​(LTLEquivalence formula)
    Returns the result of rewriting an equivalence formula.
    LTL rewriteImplication​(LTLImplication formula)
    Returns the result of rewriting an implication formula.
    LTL rewriteLTL​(LTL formula)
    Returns the result of rewriting a LTL formula.
    LTL rewriteNegation​(LTLNegation formula)
    Returns the result of rewriting a negative formula.
    LTL rewriteNext​(LTLNext formula)
    Returns the result of rewriting a next formula.

    Returns the result of rewriting an once formula.
    LTL rewriteOr​(LTLOr formula)
    Returns the result of rewriting a disjunctive formula.
    LTL rewritePrevious​(LTLPrevious formula)
    Returns the result of rewriting a previous formula.
    LTL rewriteRelease​(LTLRelease formula)
    Returns the result of rewriting a release formula.
    LTL rewriteSince​(LTLSince formula)
    Returns the result of rewriting a since formula.

    LTL rewriteUnless​(LTLUnless formula)

    Returns the result of rewriting an until formula.
